      • disposeTextures

        public void disposeTextures()
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Ensure that all resources are freed from the implementing class. Also caries out animations or anything else essential to death. batch can be null if no SpriteBatch is needed for animation
        Specified by:
        disposeTextures in interface Entity
